/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the urban landscape. The street, lined with trees and buildings, stretches out into the distance, creating a sense of depth and scale. The sky above is hazy, casting a soft light over the scene. The colors in the image are predominantly gray and green, reflecting the blend of urban development and natural elements.
